casebody.data:
The People of the State of New York, Respondent, v Barron Jackson, Also Known as Barone Jackson, Appellant.

[— NYS2d —]

— Anappeal having been taken to this Court by the above-named appellant from a judgment of the Supreme Court, Bronx County (Sharon A.M. Aarons, J.), rendered on or about October 5, 2010, said appeal having been argued by counsel for the respective parties, due deliberation having been had thereon, and finding the sentence not excessive, it is unanimously ordered that the judgment so appealed from be and the same is hereby affirmed. Concur — Tom, J.E, Acosta, Saxe and Freedman, JJ.
